colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES PA 'DI NI SNYIGS DUS SEMS CAN KYI DBUL 'PHONGS SDUG BSNGAL SEL PHYIRSA RGYAD DBANG @008A *, ,PHYUG RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS 'GOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI AIL GOG SANG HU THUG THU MIR GEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG 'OD ZER RO,, ,,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
